note: Political scientist--Comparative Politics (Europe & East Asia). Spent half the 2010s in Turin, Italy. Feral outlaw and natural anarchist not often inclined to do as I'm told. I am a student of anarchists, free spirits and self-organisers throughout culture and history.

This account is supportive of gender diversity and for freedom of consenting sexualities. I am pro slut, anti-capitalist and a promoter of cooperative promiscuity.

note:
KIA on twitter in defense of Ukraine. Here to finish the job. #NAFO

On a serious note, I stand for these things for all beings:

1. right to exist
2. right to free will of choice

In THAT order. No "free will" being used to deny others' right to exist. Right to existence is always first, because there is no free will if we don't exist. That's why I bonk orcs... blatant violations of both rights.

note:
Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.

The background pic is a cartoon from Morten Morland showing successive Conservative Prime Ministers tiptoeing away from a green tree, carrying hand- and chain-saws, in an ironic homage to the vandals who cut down the Sycamore tree felled at Hadrian's Wall.

note:
Modern Money Theory MMTer #MMT

AusMMT is a leader in educating people in modern macroeconomics. He played a founding role in educating Australians via social media channels and has engaged some prominent Australians on commentary about Modern Monetary Theory.

Real Name: Darren

He would also appreciate any paid work you can throw his way.
